Content.Knowledge Point: The importance of taking the first simple step
Content.Text: At the beginning of every difficult and complex task, there is a simple first step. If we can condition ourselves to just take the first simple step without hesitancy and without overthinking, we will find that our ability to tackle great tasks is greatly increased.

Content.Knowledge Point: The power of questioning the meta
Content.Text: We shouldn't assume that every meta has a good reason behind it either. Sometimes the meta can be improved. Having the courage, presence of mind, and intuition to see where you are imposing arbitrary rules about the way that something needs to be done is an important aspect of wu-wei.

Content.Knowledge Point: The importance of patience and self-awareness
Content.Text: I'm not sure I can do it. I'm not sure I can do it. I'm not sure I can do it. I'm not sure I can do it. I'm not sure I can do it. I'm not sure I can do it.
